pullrequest.title: Add some comments about pull requests

content.raw: Looks good. It might be hard to plan for pull requests, may be another way to think about this is to try break down the project into smaller items and each item could potentially be a pull request. There should be some sort of dependencies between the items to give an idea of the order that these pull requests will be submitted.
content.html: Looks good. It might be hard to plan for pull requests, may be another way to think about this is to try break down the project into smaller items and each item could potentially be a pull request. There should be some sort of dependencies between the items to give an idea of the order that these pull requests will be submitted.
